channel.title: Post your RS07 Cash Stack!
channel.description:
Credits to myself, Foz and Rodgerwilco. Oh, and Dokan42 aswell :P.
Proof that our clan works, btw. [img]http://puu.sh/27Eiw[/img]
EDIT: Changed title since apparently other people have more lol

item.title: Post your RS07 Cash Stack!
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:26, topic:495290”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=613521.msg4239686#msg4239686 date=1361751364]
Just saying, when you divide the profits evenly amongst the people working on it they are much lower than they would be doing them solo.
[/quote]
Not with the above method. Say only 3 of us worked that day, that’s 728k each in a weeks time. That’s incredible profits for the current economy :P.[/quote]
There are methods out already that will even out to be 5,040,000 profit without any money spent for a single player in a weeks time.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your RS07 Cash Stack!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

You can believe what you want, however we all feel like we’re getting somewhere and within the next few days should be making around 2.1m per day (split between the contributing members). 2.1m = 3k yews cut, fletched and alched. Just waiting on me getting 70 fletching and 55 magic being achieved.

This isn’t a thread about the way that clan works though, keep it on topic

Read full topic

item.title: Post your RS07 Cash Stack!
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:20, topic:495290”]@Andrew Ferguson bnl is crafting nature runes right now, I’m a few hours from 70 fletching, bnl is also working towards 55 mage to alch the bows and Foz has 60+ woodcutting for the trees. Please tell me where we can’t make profit from that?

And btw, this isn’t everyone’s money in here. Only me and Foz have been really determined. I’ve had around 500 logs from Dokan and 1k strings from Rodgerwilco, that’s it.[/quote]
Never said you CAN’T make profit from it, I said you WILL NOT make anything near what you could if you just let people play, pushing the resources onto one player just doesn’t make sense. It’s not like you’re saving anytime fletching the logs on another account, you can fletch 2k+ logs an hour, much faster than it takes to cut them and in the time it takes for you to coordinate to transfer them knocks out that 5 minute bonus time you would have gained from doing this method.

It’s just a rather poor method. IMO.

If we have a community that has a total value of 10k coins let say, now this is divided between two people. Both players have 5k each and now one player gives 5k to the other. One player now has 10k, but that doesn’t mean we’ve profited 10k, our total value is still 10k but now we have one person with items and another that’s poor. It’s not progress, it’s moving items/xp around when in all reality it’s much more efficient to just let them stay where they are to build.

Read full topic

@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

@Andrew Ferguson bnl is crafting nature runes right now, I’m a few hours from 70 fletching, bnl is also working towards 55 mage to alch the bows and Foz has 60+ woodcutting for the trees. Please tell me where we can’t make profit from that?

And btw, this isn’t everyone’s money in here. Only me and Foz have been really determined. I’ve had around 500 logs from Dokan and 1k strings from Rodgerwilco, that’s it.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your RS07 Cash Stack!
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

The logic just doesn’t make sense though, that’s like if 5 people gave one person $5 each, well yes that one person now has $25 but all 5 of those people are now broke. It’s just idiotic to claim this to be a success in my mind, this isn’t a clan that’s working together, this is multiple people giving all their items to one person. You’re trying to boost stats that aren’t even useful right now in the game, for example fletching, trying to get yew long bows for profit right now is just silly, you can not profit off them till nature runes are actually in the game at a normal rate and that will take at least 2 more weeks. In that time all those people who are feeding one person their resources could have gotten the stats themselves easily and we would actually make more money as we have multiple people doing these skills rather than one guy who holds all the money and resources.

Right now it’s like we’ve thrown all our money in one pile and then in two weeks we’ll just give it back. It’s just a loop that really doesn’t help anything. You posted the clans 117k cash stack with people giving you their resources to fletch and sell for a profit, but I’m doing everything solo and I have a 70k cash stack, I’m not even playing that much. Now imagine if we actually let our members play rather than feed one member to make him/her better than everyone. We’d actually be doing so much better.

Currently we’re helping one player do 150% better, but making multiple players do horribly worse.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your RS07 Cash Stack!
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Tutorial, post:15, topic:495290”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=613521.msg4239436#msg4239436 date=1361737570]

Not hating, but it’s kinda weird to claim to be #1 in cash stacks or that the clan system works when all we’ve really done is give multiple players items to one player.

Credits to myself, Foz and Rodgerwilco. Oh, and Dokan42 aswell :P.

Wasn’t saying I was #1 cash stacks lol I was just seeing if it was the first on MoparScape. The clan system does work or we wouldn’t have gotten thus far :o You can also see that I gave them all the credits in getting the items in the above quote lol
[/quote]
Still, I don’t see how you guys are having this much pride in a group effort. This is not what the old RS was about at all…[/quote]

This is barely into the first stages of what the group effort is supposed to do. Eventually we will have a self-sustaining source of income without actually trading to anyone outside of the clan.

Read full topic
